artist: Artist: Kobayashi Kiyochika; Publisher: Fukuda Kumajirō
catalogue_raissonne: Virgin et al., Japan at the Dawn of the Modern Age (MFA, 2001), fig.7, photo p. 18; Shizuoka Mus., Kobayashi Kiyoshika (exh. cat., 1998), #39; Smith, Kiyochika (exh. cat., Santa Barbara, 1988), #31; Yoshida, Kiyochika (1964), #7
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: evening scene; standing shadowed figures along B edge of image; lanterns hang above figures; two figures in a tree obscured in shadow; fireworks in sky in background
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Fireworks at Ike-no-hata
